A Free Cloud IDE With Perks!

I love to find free resources online for developers and this one is amazing! Many times I am asked for a free resource to somewhere to develop node apps or typescript apps. I found this little gem a while back and have been testing it. They set you up on the free account with 5 “containers”, a CLoud IDE connected to your container and 10 Gigs to play around with.

You also have access to a Linux server of your choosing when you set up. They support numerous languages out of the box and I have really enjoyed it so far. I set up a CodeAnywhere account and it was a little tough to understand where everything is, how to install, etc. None of those problems greeted me on Goorm.io I was up and running in no time, and with only a couple of dollars a month I can upgrade to a persistant box with way more features.

Combine Goorm + DigitalOcean and build your own development web server for a fraction of the cost.

May 28, 2020 · IDE , Freebies
